about_the_game:
The E-sports Godfather Expansion Pack

The expansion pack introduces 3 unique heroes and 20 brand-new pieces of equipment to help coaches dominate the game.

# No need to restart the game, heroes can train directly, equipment will be added to the equipment pool randomly in the next season

3 New Heroes

Quinn

Marksman / Physical / Ranged
On the battlefield, the cold and ruthless Queen of Hearts, Quinn, uses her trusty heavy grenade launcher—an old companion—to bring death to her foes.

Quinn can gain more critical damage through critical hits, and upon entering Heart Form, she deals massive overkill critical damage to her enemies.

Moreover, her extremely high single-target damage will never be wasted on a low-health unit; any overflow damage will be transferred to the remaining enemies, continuing to pose a threat.

Foso

Mage / Magic / Melee

"Where did my eagle go?"
                                                                                                                                       — Omaha

During fights, the magic master Foso excels at attacking multiple targets, especially summoned units.

Of course, if you're relieved that your draft doesn't include any summoned units, think again. Foso’s impenetrable shield will teach you a lesson you won’t forget.

Matata

Fighter / Physical / Melee

The polar warrior Matata thrives in drawn-out battles. He specializes in tearing open wounds on his opponents and using them to heal himself.

Every year, countless ambitious young challengers face Matata in pursuit of the title of the strongest polar warrior. But alas, in combat, they see Matata remain unscathed while their own wounds multiply. Ultimately, they fall in despair, becoming yet another statistic in Matata’s undefeated record.

 

20 New Pieces of Equipment

In addition to the three new heroes, the expansion brings 20 powerful pieces of equipment. Find the perfect match for these items and dominate your matches!
